amendment.description: An amendment numbered 12 printed in Part B of House Report 116-383 to prohibit the inclusion of arrest records on a consumer report if the consumer was not convicted for the arrest.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in Part B of House Report 116-383 to prohibit the inclusion of arrest records on a consumer report if the consumer was not convicted for the arrest.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Takano amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Takano.
